citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45am on June,
10 2024. The licensee was not home and a family member said he would not be able to return for an inspection and that
there was no one else that could accompany an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records
for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45am on June, 
10 2024. The licensee was not home and a family member said he would not be able to return for an inspection and that 
there was no one else that could accompany an inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records 
for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
